Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near 47th/Cornell Drive
ShortDescription: NB 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temp. rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, 39th and DuSable Lake Shore Drive: due to, street blockage near 47th/Cornell Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Cottage Grove, 39th and DuSable Lake Shore Drive: due to, street blockage near 47th/Cornell Drive.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Service Delayed at Pulaski
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are standing at Pulaski due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. Shuttle buses have been requested between Western and Midway to provide connecting service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
